books.title: The Hacker Mindset: A Beginner's Guide
books.subtitle: Thinking Like a Cybersecurity Professional
books.description: Learn the fundamental thought processes and methodologies used by ethical hackers and security researchers. Perfect for complete beginners.
books.longDescription: This comprehensive guide breaks down the hacker mindset into actionable steps. You'll learn reconnaissance techniques, vulnerability assessment, basic exploit development, and how to approach security problems systematically. Includes real-world scenarios and exercises.

testimonials.text: Finally a book that explains the hacker mindset without being overly technical!
testimonials.author: Alex R.

books.title: Network Defense Playbook
books.subtitle: Practical Strategies for Securing Networks
books.description: Actionable strategies and techniques for defending modern networks against real-world attacks.
books.longDescription: From firewall configurations to intrusion detection systems, this playbook provides step-by-step instructions for securing networks of all sizes. Includes configuration templates, monitoring scripts, and incident response checklists.

testimonials.text: The configuration templates alone are worth the price!
testimonials.author: Sam K.

books.title: Web App Hacking Labs
books.subtitle: Hands-On Exercises for Bug Bounty Hunters
books.description: Build and hack your own intentionally vulnerable web applications to master penetration testing techniques.
books.longDescription: This hands-on guide walks you through setting up a home lab environment, deploying vulnerable applications, and practicing common web vulnerabilities like SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, and SSRF. Perfect for aspiring bug bounty hunters.

testimonials.text: The hands-on approach accelerated my bug bounty skills tremendously.
testimonials.author: Jordan T.
